amendment.description: To increase funding for the Community Develeopment Block Grant Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3050 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 38. Record Vote Number: 44.

action.text: Amendment SA 3050 proposed by Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S2153, S2154-2158, S2173-2174; text: CR S2153) To increase funding for the Community Develeopment Block Grant Program.
